author: mturk
msg: Fix #42728 by not using the apr_os_thread_current. WIN32 implementation calls DuplicateHandle and OpenSSL uses this callback in DLL_THREAD_DETACH, meaning that the handles will leak for each created thread

author: bentmann
msg: o Added IT to check JBoss-specific configuration

author: fapeeler
msg: added logoff_user routine, user del fails if user is still logged on

author: markrmiller
msg: LUCENE-1871: Highlighter wraps caching token filters that are not CachingTokenFilter in CachingTokenFilter

author: mikedd
msg: Enable CacheStoreMode and CacheRetrieveMode properties to be set for an EntityManager.
